name: Armilla (jsingh22)
description:
You are a student in search of their professor, who has gone on an expedition to uncover the secrets of the lost city of pipes: Armilla. Can you find her? Will you find out what became of the city? Only time will tell....

Explore the city and uncover the the journals left behind by your professor, documenting her experiences while exploring the city. 

A Game by Jonathan Singh for DATT 3300: Lab 01.
